titleStmt.title: A discourse, confirming the truth and certainty of the Christian faith from the extraordinary gifts and operations of the Holy Ghost vouchsafed to the apostles and primitive professors of that faith / by Daniel Whitby ...
titleStmt.author: Whitby, Daniel, 1638-1726.
